name: Nycto
description:
Nycto is a game made by Team Grim Turkeys.
"Work your way out with a little vision and solve puzzles"

Controls: [RTS]

- LMB to select character
- RMB to move selected characters
- DRAG to select multiple characters

"Point and Click for solving puzzles"

Mechanics:

- Vision is limited and depletes when you get isolated from the group
- Your vision acts as the health of each of your characters regrouping with others refills your vison
- Be careful with shadows. Shadows targets blinded characters - [Characters with zero vision]- and characters in group.
- Clear puzzles as fast as possible, Shadows grow stronger as time goes by!

Members: [Team Grim Turkeys]
- Rito Ramos
- RV  Santiago III
- Justine Singma
- Jine Yap
- Emmanuel Lozano
- EJ Catubag
